channel.title: python on Picky speaker
channel.description: Recent content in python on Picky speaker

item.title: PocketBook Quote Export
item.description: It’s painful to take out quotes from PocketBook using PocketBook itself. The interface is slow and the default reader app (the best one in my opinion) has no option for bulk imports of quotes. So I wrote a simple script to extract & transform quotes from the internal PocketBook DB. The PocketBook database schema The quote extractor You may want to change the default path of the DB, filter_quote, transform_quote and print_results.

item.title: The beauty of typed Python
item.description: Here’s an example of typed Python. import itertools from typing import Callable, Iterable, List, Tuple, TypeVar A = TypeVar('A') B = TypeVar('B') def groupby_eager(iterable: Iterable[A], key: Callable[[A], B]) -> List[Tuple[B, List[A]]]: groups = itertools.groupby(sorted(iterable, key=key), key=key) return [ (group_name, list(group)) for group_name, group in groups ]
